title: riot please forgive me

replies.body:
Having 'bad' internet is nothing to feel sorry for or need to be forgiven! If you think you might ever have problems with your connection, feel free to check out this [**Lag Report**](https://lagreport.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/) which can give you a bit of an overview of how your connection compares to others around you ^_^!

Also, if you start having problems, always try troubleshooting with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in practice or custom games, that way you won't get any punishments.
